title: Ballad of Jon Doe
description: This book contains dark and graphic scenes. Suitable for readers 18+ I am their weapon.Their instrument of destruction.I gave my soul freely to the Devil.My life was theirs to control.But I'm just a number easily replaced.The things I've done in their name made me feared but doomed me to an eternity in hell...until I saw herOne look, and their hold was shattered.One look, and I placed her in their crosshairs.One look, and my heart was hers forever. Readers should note this book contains descriptions of domestic violence, violence, rape, and sexual content appropriate for adults only.
author: Serafina Jax
